tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE fertilizer_monitoring (
   id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   date DATE,
   fertilizer_type VARCHAR(50),
   application_method VARCHAR(50),
   application_rate DECIMAL,
   effectiveness DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE fertilizer_applications (
 id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 application_date DATE,
 fertilizer_type TEXT,
 amount_applied DECIMAL,
 crop_type TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE fertilizer_applications (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  application_date DATE,
  fertilizer_name VARCHAR(50),
  crop_type VARCHAR(50),
  amount_applied DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE crop_yields (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  yield_date DATE,
  crop_type VARCHAR(50),
  yield_amount DECIMAL(10,2),
  effectiveness_rating INT
);

CREATE TABLE weather_conditions (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  date DATE,
  temperature DECIMAL(5,2),
  humidity DECIMAL(5,2),
  rainfall DECIMAL(5,2)
);

CREATE TABLE fertilizer_application (
    application_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    crop_id INT,
    application_date DATE,
    fertilizer_type VARCHAR(50),
    quantity_applied DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE crop_yield (
    yield_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    crop_id INT,
    yield_date DATE,
    yield_amount DECIMAL,
    weather_condition VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE crop (
    crop_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    crop_name VARCHAR(50),
    crop_type VARCHAR(50),
    planting_date DATE,
    harvest_date DATE
);
